page.title: 12Farming
page.content: The area is predominantly agricultural. There are three large farming units. Olantigh Estate, including Trimworth, Bilting Grange and Wye Court. Olantigh is 760 acres, arable and grazing, and carries 100 Sussex cattle, 440 Dorset, 500 Kent and 160 crossbred sheep. Hay is made. There are 4 tractors, grasscutter, baler, sprayer, drill and muck spreader. Harvesting for corn is done by outside contractors. The farm employs 4 men full-time, 2 live in tied cottages and 2 in their own homes. 2 woodmen live in tied cottages. Bilting Grange is 284 acres.There are 200 Kent sheep. Hay and silage are made.
